content.rendered:
Play Crossy Road Online for free

Crossy Road is an Popular Arcade Video Game.

It was developed and published by Australian video game developer Hipster Whale, with the name and concept of the game playing on the age-old joke “Why did the chicken cross the road?” The game has also been described as endless runner version of Frogger.

you can play Crossy Road exclusively online for free in the browser.

How to play Crossy Road?

Crossy Road is about endless running game like the hurdle race with the Obstacles.
Avoiding obstacles like Boxes, TNT, Cars, Ambulances, Truck, Trolleys, Barricades. Collecting more and more stars to unlock your favourite Cartoon Characters.
Use the arrow keys to move sideways or forward. Don’t stand in the way of upcoming cars, or other incoming objects.

Crossy Road Gameplay

The Making of CROSSY ROAD

Is Crossy Road free on PC?

Crossy Road is available to download for free from the Windows and Windows Phone Stores today! With unpredictable characters like an unlucky cat, giddy goat, dragon or flea, it’s your job to help them cross roads, train tracks and rivers.
